VerifiyEmail.subject: like.co 이메일을 인증하세요
VerifiyEmail.body:
{{name}}님, 안녕하세요!

like.co에 잘 오셨습니다! 이메일을 인증하시려면 다음 링크를 클릭하세요:
https://like.co/verify/{{uuid}}?ref={{ref}}

VerifiyAndCouponEmail.subject: 본인의 like.co 이메일을 인증하고 LikeCoin을 받으세요
VerifiyAndCouponEmail.body:
{{name}}님, 안녕하세요!

like.co에 잘 오셨습니다! 이메일을 인증하고 레드 포켓을 받으려면 다음 링크를 클릭하세요:
https://like.co/verify/{{uuid}}/{{coupon}}?ref={{ref}}

받으실 쿠폰 코드: {{coupon}}

PendingSubscriptionEmail.subject: Please complete your LikeCoin donation subscription
PendingSubscriptionEmail.body:
Hi!

Thank you for joining LikeCoin donation program!

Please register a like.co account below and complete the subscription process.

http://like.co/in/donation/claim?subscriptionId={{subscriptionId}}&email={{email}}

Feel free to contact us on our official website should you have any thoughts or question.

SubscriptionThankYouEmail.subject: Thank you for joining the LikeCoin donation program
SubscriptionThankYouEmail.body:
Hi {{name}}!

Thank you for joining LikeCoin donation program!

For more details on the program, please check http://like.co/in/donation

Feel free to contact us on our official website should you have any thoughts or question.
